item.title: Polars tips
item.description: Print DataFrame without omitting with pl.Config(tbl_rows=1, tbl_cols=100): print(df1) print(df2) with pl.Config(tbl_rows=1, tbl_cols=100): print(df) Copy df = df.unique(subset=["datetime"]) Copy polars polars polars polars polarspolars polars polars polars polars polars
